author: ptraczyk
body:
In order to allow out-of-time muon rejection during the muon ID stage of analyses two things have been changed:
1. hit pruning (outlier rejection) in DT has been switched on. The algorithm has been tweaked slightly.
2. RPC timing was added directly to the reco::Muon dataformat. The time calculation was added and timing code was re-organized in places.

The improvements in DT timing after the change have been shown here: https://indico.cern.ch/event/483080/contribution/1/attachments/1212148/1768319/ptraczyk_201601_muon_timing.pdf

Nothing besides the performance of DT timing (and CSC timing to a very small extent) should change.
title: Add RPC timing in reco::Muon dataformat. Improve DT timing calculation
